thag2.34:5.1: I’ve seen lay disciples who have memorized discourses,
thag2.34:5.3: But they’re obsessed with jewels and earrings,
thag2.34:5.4: concerned for their partners and children.
thag2.34:6.1: To be honest, they don’t know Dhamma,
thag2.34:6.2: even though they say “Sensual pleasures are impermanent”.
thag2.34:6.3: They don’t have the power to cut their lust,
thag2.34:6.4: which is why they cling to children, wives, and wealth.
